historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 47-425.

1973 Ed., § 47-335.

Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 12(d) of Tax Clarity and Recorder of Deeds Emergency Act of 2002 (D.C. Act 14-381, June 6, 2002, 49 DCR 5674).

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-20, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-421.

For Law 15-105, see notes following § 47-340.22.
